title: Stuck at 33%, scanning files after the Lol disconnected me....
body:
I was playing a ranked match, roughly 20 minutes into the game and I got disconnected from the game. Nothing was wrong with my internet and browsing the web was still working fine. Re opened the client,  it was stuck at 33% and constantly scanning files. I now have to download another 3gig from the patcher after following the advice on another similar thread.

This is ridiculous as I have been disconnected about 4-5 times throughout the week and every time I have to fiddle with my computer or client to get it back in, by which time it's usually too late.

replies.body:
Did you eventually redownload the game?

It could be that something on your computer is corrupting the files, initiating the patcher's auto-repair feature (which just says "whelp time to redownload"). What OS are you on?
